sentences.chinese: 自殷以前諸侯不可得而譜，周以來乃頗可著。
sentences.literal: From Yin before feudal lords cannot obtained and genealogized, Zhou since then considerably can recorded. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 孔子因史文次春秋，紀元年，正時日月，蓋其詳哉。
sentences.literal: Confucius followed historical texts arranged Spring Autumn, recorded first year, corrected seasons days months, indeed its detailed. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 或頗有，然多闕，不可錄。
sentences.literal: Some considerably had, yet many missing, cannot recorded. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 故疑則傳疑，蓋其慎也。
sentences.literal: Therefore doubt then transmit doubt, indeed its cautious. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 余讀諜記，黃帝以來皆有年數。
sentences.literal: I read secret records, Yellow Emperor since all have year numbers. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 稽其歷譜諜終始五德之傳，古文咸不同，乖異。
sentences.literal: Check their calendar genealogies secret records beginning end five virtues transmission, ancient texts all different, divergent. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 於是以五帝系諜、尚書集世紀黃帝以連山訖共和為世表。
sentences.literal: Thereupon with Five Emperors genealogical records, Documents of Antiquity collected century Yellow Emperor with Lianshan until Gonghe as generation table. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 詩言契生於卵，后稷人跡者，欲見其有天命精誠之意耳。
sentences.literal: Poetry speaks Jie born from egg, Hou Ji human footprints, wished to show they had heaven mandate sincere intentions only. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 一言有父，一言無父，信以傳信，疑以傳疑，故兩言之。
sentences.literal: One says has father, one says no father, believe to transmit believe, doubt to transmit doubt, therefore both speak. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 堯知契、稷皆賢人，天之所生，故封之契七十里，後十餘世至湯，王天下。
sentences.literal: Yao knew Jie, Ji all worthy people, heaven what born, therefore enfeoffed Jie seventy li, after ten more generations to Tang, king tianxia. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 堯知后稷子孫之後王也，故益封之百里，其後世且千歲，至文王而有天下。
sentences.literal: Yao knew Hou Ji descendants later kings also, therefore additionally enfeoffed him hundred li, his later generations nearly thousand years, to Wen Wang then had tianxia. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 契母與姊妹浴於玄丘水，有燕銜卵墮之，契母得，故含之，誤吞之，即生契。
sentences.literal: Jie mother with elder sisters bathed at Xuanqiu water, had swallow held egg fell it, Jie mother got, therefore held it, mistakenly swallowed it, immediately gave birth Jie. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 契生而賢，堯立為司徒，姓之曰子氏。
sentences.literal: Jie born and worthy, Yao established as Situ, surnamed him Zi clan. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 茲，益大也。
sentences.literal: Ci, increasingly great also. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 商者質，殷號也。
sentences.literal: Shang what solid, Yin designation also. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 文王之先為后稷，后稷亦無父而生。
sentences.literal: Wen Wang what ancestor Hou Ji, Hou Ji also no father born. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 后稷母為姜嫄，出見大人蹟而履踐之，知於身，則生后稷。
sentences.literal: Hou Ji mother was Jiang Yuan, went out saw great person footprints stepped on them, knew in body, then gave birth Hou Ji. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 姜嫄以為無父，賤而棄之道中，牛羊避不踐也。
sentences.literal: Jiang Yuan took as no father, lowly abandoned on road middle, cattle sheep avoided not trampled also. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 抱之山中，山者養之。
sentences.literal: Embraced it mountain middle, mountain people nurtured it. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 又捐之大澤，鳥覆席食之。
sentences.literal: Again abandoned it great marsh, birds covered warmed fed it. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 姜嫄怪之，於是知其天子，乃取長之。
sentences.literal: Jiang Yuan wondered at it, thereupon knew its Son of Heaven, then took raised it. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 堯知其賢才，立以為大農，姓之曰姬氏。
sentences.literal: Yao knew his worthy talent, established as great farmer, surnamed him Ji clan. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 姬者，本也。
sentences.literal: Ji what root also. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 命后稷為姬氏，為有文王也。
sentences.literal: Commanded Hou Ji as Ji clan, for had Wen Wang also. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 大王命季歷，明天瑞也。
sentences.literal: Great King commanded Ji Li, made clear heaven auspicious also. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 天命難言，非聖人莫能見。
sentences.literal: Heaven mandate difficult speak, not sage none can see. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 舜、禹、契、后稷皆黃帝子孫也。
sentences.literal: Shun, Yu, Jie, Hou Ji all Yellow Emperor descendants also. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 黃帝策天命而治天下，德澤深後世，故其子孫皆復立為天子，是天之報有德也。
sentences.literal: Yellow Emperor tallied heaven mandate governed tianxia, virtue favor deep later generations, therefore his descendants all again established as Sons of Heaven, this heaven what repays virtuous also. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 人不知，以為閒從布衣匹夫起耳。
sentences.literal: People not know, took as idly following plain clothed commoner arose only. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 黃帝是也。
sentences.literal: Yellow Emperor is this. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 五政明則修禮義，因天時舉兵征伐而利者王，有福千世。
sentences.literal: Five governments clear then repair ritual righteousness, follow heaven timing raise troops attack punish beneficial ones king, have fortune thousand generations. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 人君王者舉而觀之。
sentences.literal: Person ruler kings raise observe it. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 漢大將軍霍子孟名光者，亦黃帝後世也。
sentences.literal: Han great general Huo Zi Meng named Guang, also Yellow Emperor later generations also. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 此可為博聞遠見者言，固難為淺聞者說也。
sentences.literal: This can for broad knowledge far vision ones speak, indeed difficult for shallow knowledge ones explain also. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 古諸侯以國為姓。
sentences.literal: Ancient feudal lords with state as surname. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 霍者，國名也。
sentences.literal: Huo what state name also. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 武王封弟叔處於霍，後世晉獻公滅霍公，後世為庶民，往來居平陽。
sentences.literal: Martial King enfeoffed younger brother Shu Chu at Huo, later generations Jin Xian duke extinguished Huo duke, later generations became common people, came went resided Pingyang. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 平陽在河東，河東晉地，分為衛國。
sentences.literal: Pingyang at Hedong, Hedong Jin territory, divided into Wei state. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 以詩言之，亦可為周世。
sentences.literal: With Poetry speak it, also can for Zhou generations. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 周起后稷，后稷無父而生。
sentences.literal: Zhou arose Hou Ji, Hou Ji no father born. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 高辛，黃帝曾孫。
sentences.literal: Gao Xin, Yellow Emperor great grandson. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 霍將軍者，本居平陽（自）［白］燕。
sentences.literal: Huo general, originally resided Pingyang Bai Yan. (translated).

sentences.chinese: 臣為郎時，與方士考功會旗亭下，為臣言。
sentences.literal: Minister as lang time, with fangshi Kao Gong met at flag pavilion below, for minister spoke. (translated).
